feed.title: ServerBox Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ServerBox: v1.0.1018
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: fix typo of "F-Droid" by @Integral-Tech in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/423
  • l10n: fix English translations by @Integral-Tech in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/424
  • l10n: fix Japanese translations by @Integral-Tech in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/425
  • docs(README): add f-droid & reorganize other installation methods by @Integral-Tech in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/429
  • l10n: add noLineChartForCpu field by @Integral-Tech in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/431
  • l10n: fix translation of net/network by @Integral-Tech in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/433
  • l10n: fix two acronyms (MAC, URL) by @Integral-Tech in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/436
  • l10n: alterUrl -> fallbackSshDest by @Integral-Tech in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/437
  • l10n: fix remaining translations by @Integral-Tech in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/439
  • Windows点进服务器详情页时若断连无法退出断联页面 by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/441
  • 自动执行代码段无法取消选择 by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/442
  • feat: write script into /dev/shm by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/444
  • feat: disable letter cache by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/446
  • fix: ssh card tap area by @No06 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/448
  • fix: window blink on startup by @No06 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/447
  • fix: desktop window appbar by @No06 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/450
  • fix: version display by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/458
  • fix: linux duplicated title bar by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/462
  • fix: update changelog by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/466
  • feat: sftp perm setting & path copy by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/467

New Contributors

  • @No06 made their first contribution in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/448

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/compare/v1.0.992...v1.0.1018

entry.title: New release for ServerBox: v1.0.1034
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: termux compatibility by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/472
  • rollback: write script to /dev/shm by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/474
  • feat: display cpu model by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/477
  • fix: bio auth by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/482
  • fix: uploaded file's path on windows by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/484
  • feat: set envs in term by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/485
  • opt.: simplify settings page by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/488
  • rm: pkg by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/494
  • fix: termux compatibility by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/495
  • feat: use $EDITOR to edit files by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/496

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/compare/v1.0.1018...v1.0.1034

entry.title: New release for ServerBox: v1.0.1051
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add TR Locales by @mikropsoft in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/497
  • fix: builtin editor by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/503
  • opt.: remove internal SharePreference keys while using KvEditor by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/509
  • feat: import snippets from file/network/clipboard by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/510
  • opt.: bulk import servers by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/512
  • opt.: l10n & fix: write script by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/514
  • bug: color seed setting not working by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/516
  • fix: home widget url by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/517
  • opt.: use ssh term to decompress by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/519

New Contributors

  • @mikropsoft made their first contribution in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/497

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/compare/v1.0.1034...v1.0.1051

entry.title: New release for ServerBox: v1.0.1070
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: ssh tab focus mgmt by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/525
  • opt.: macos icon by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/527
  • feat: share server via qrcode by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/530
  • feat: systemd management by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/532
  • opt.: sftp home & back by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/533
  • opt.: hide logo if distribution == null by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/536
  • refactors by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/539
  • bug: privatekey update actually creates a new key by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/541
  • feat: custom net dev by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/543
  • feat: custom shell script install path by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/545

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/compare/v1.0.1051...v1.0.1070

entry.title: New release for ServerBox: v1.0.1104
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: lang switch by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/553
  • fix: ssh alter url by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/554
  • fix: ssh tab page UI by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/555
  • new: custom foreground service on Android by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/556
  • l10n: fixed Japanese translations. by @Shin-suechtig in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/558
  • fix: backup on windows by @No06 in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/563
  • opt.: back btn on scan page by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/568
  • opt.: split webdav & other settings by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/569
  • fix: snippet fmt by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/570
  • l10n: Added Ukrainian lang by @CakesTwix in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/574
  • opt.: sync immediately after changes by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/577
  • opt.: spi with same id by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/585
  • opt.: redesigned settings page by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/587
  • opt.: dismiss notification if no ssh conn by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/592
  • new: ios18 dark app icon by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/594
  • opt.: more virtual keys by @lollipopkit in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/596
  • new: material you icon by @GitGitro in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/599
  • [Translation] Russian fix by @MasedMSD in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/604

New Contributors

  • @Shin-suechtig made their first contribution in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/558
  • @CakesTwix made their first contribution in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/574
  • @GitGitro made their first contribution in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/599
  • @MasedMSD made their first contribution in https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/pull/604

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lollipopkit/flutter_server_box/compare/v1.0.1070...v1.0.1104
